corpus.checks.description: Check the consistency of text corpora.

corpus.slicing.description: Corpus chunk size in percent of the maximum allowed package size by the MySQL server.

input.fields.label: Input fields:
input.fields.description: Columns to be used from the input tables.

input.sources.label: Input sources:
input.sources.description: Types of tables to be used as input.

input.tables.label: Input tables:
input.tables.description: Names of tables to be used as input.

restart.after.label: Re-analyze after (s):
restart.after.description: Time (in s) after which to re-start the analysis once it has been completed (-1=deactivated).

sleep.mysql.description: Time (in s) to wait before last try to re-connect to the MySQL server.

sleep.when.finished.description: Time (in ms) to wait each tick when finished.

target.table.label: Target table:
target.table.description: Table name to save analyzed data to.

target.column.label: Resulting column:
target.column.description: Name of the column in the target table to create the JSON file for uploading from.

ftp.label: FTP target URL:
ftp.description: URL to upload the JSON file containing the result to (starts with 'ftp://' or 'sftp://'; might include username, password, and path on the server).

proxy.label: FTP proxy
proxy.description: URL of proxy to use while uploading the JSON file containing the result (if empty, no proxy will be used).
